Ressources de la galerie, liste des images (#Res(id-img1),#Res(id-img2),...)

Type.SourceCode:
class VDOM_photogallery(VDOM_object): def compute(self): import utils VDOM_object.compute(self) res= self.resources finalim = res.split(',') self.finalimage = [] if self.prewidth and self.preheight: size = self.prewidth,self.preheight from utils.imaging import VDOM_imaging im = VDOM_imaging() for res_id in finalim: res_id = res_id.strip() label = "%s_%s_%s" %(res_id,self.prewidth,self.preheight) resource = application.resources.get_by_label(self.id, label) if resource: self.finalimage.append(resource.id) else: im.load(application.id,res_id) im.thumbnail((int(size[0]),int(size[1]))) self.finalimage.append(im.save_temporary(application.id,self.id,label)) def render(self, contents=""): if self.visible == "1": if self.rows and self.columns and self.resources: gal = "" max = len(self.finalimage) res = self.finalimage res_big = self.resources.split(',') j = int(self.skip_images) for i in xrange( 1,int(self.rows) +1 ): gal += "" for k in xrange( 1,int(self.columns) +1 ): if j < max: gal += """"""%(res_big[j].strip(),res[j]) j+=1 else: gal += "" gal += "" script = "" data = """ %s
"""%(self.width,self.height,gal) style="position: absolute; z-index: "+self.zindex+"; overflow: auto; top: "+self.top+"px; left: "+self.left+"px; width: "+self.width+"px; height: "+self.height+"px ;" id = 'o_' + (self.id).replace('-', '_') return """
%s
%s"""%(id,style,data,script) else: return "" def wysiwyg(self, parent, contents=""): w = self.width h = self.height result = """"""%(self.id, self.zindex,w,h, self.top, self.left) result += """"""%(0,0,w,h) if self.rows and self.columns and self.resources: gal = "" max = len(self.finalimage) res = self.finalimage j= int(self.skip_images) x = y = 0 w_gal = (int(w))/(int(self.columns)) h_gal = (int(h))/(int(self.rows)) res_big = self.resources.split(',') for i in xrange( 1,int(self.rows) +1 ): result +=""%h_gal for k in xrange( 1,int(self.columns) +1 ): if j < max: result += ""\ ""\ ""\ ""\ ""%(self.prewidth,self.preheight,res[j],0,0) j+=1 result += "" result += "
" result += "" return VDOM_object.wysiwyg(self, parent, contents=result)
